extendedInfo.description: Famous Quote: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.  ~Larry KingThe Lucky Charms in this application are specially designed to give you as much luck as possible. Be it school, work or business, the Lucky Charms are here to give you lots and lots of pure Luck to take you one step closer to your dreams. Each Lucky Charm is uniquely rare and has it's very own specific use. A detailed list of instructions is attached in the application with directions letting you know when you should use which Lucky Charm to maximize your luck exposure.A little extra luck never fails to disappoint anyone. The Lucky Charms will last forever :)Note: Get the Premium Ad-Free version to gain access to a whole lot more Lucky Charms!

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: I assume by the size of the file that this app is supposed to do something. But all I get is 2 lame wallpapers. No menu options at all.  Doesn\'t do amything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very stupid app
reviews.comment: Is very bore . It just has one wallpaper.
reviews.author: A Google User
